review: I love it just dont like having to use the internet for it
author: latisha McCoy

review: Working well, packaging was impressive. Problem with opening to insert batteries. Had to Google for instructions on what should be an easy and obvious step. Design flaw!!!
author: Firefly

review: I love this stick, no issues with it, easy to install, and I get great value with my Amazon Prime and use of this Fire Stick, very glad I got it.
author: gemeyesgreen

review: Like the movie selection and easy to set up and use.
author: Edward Lohr "GR Kindle"

review: Bought so we could watch Bosch, but use it for movies we cannot rent anywhere else.  Great investment and free shipping too.
author: Marsha Lorentzen

review: I'm about two weeks in using my Fire TV stick. It seams to be everything said about it now & going forward. I like how it was already Registered to my name and with my Amazon account and Amazon prime. From what I am reading about the fire stick his upcoming future I may not have to pay for cable in the future; $126 Comcast 😞😟🙅😡
author: Otis Hawkins
